Job Title: Risk Manager with Security Clearance

Location: Huntsville, AL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
Intrepid sets the standard for delivering excellence in the federal marketplace and is known for treating employees like family. We provide our employees with a challenging and supportive work environment, paired with a competitive salary and an industry-leading 401k contribution. We are looking for a Risk Manager to support the Integrated Fires Mission Command (IFMC) Project Office in the oversight of their Risk, Issue, and Opportunity Management (RIOM) program. Your day-to-day work will include: * Lead the team in the identification/mitigation of risks to cost, schedule, and/or performance; identification/resolution of realized risks (i.e., issues), which may involve coordination with senior military leadership (O-5 and above); and identification/exploitation of opportunities offering potential future benefits to cost, schedule, and/or performance. * Leading/supporting RIOM forums, to include Risk Working Groups (RWGs) and Risk Management Boards (RMBs) * Updating the RIOM Plan, as needed * Preparing/presenting risk briefings, reports, and documents required for program reviews. * Maintaining the IFMC Active Risk Manager (ARM) database At a minimum, you should have: * Must be a US Citizen and a resident of the Huntsville, AL area or be willing to relocate to the Huntsville, AL are
